name: Kung Fu Ping Pong
description:
To challenge the table tennis player and experience the table tennis that never experienced.

your wish will come ture here.

"Kung Fu Ping Pong" is a simulation of table tennis game. In the game, the elementary players grow up under master’s love and strict teaching until they become the master of table tennis.

The table tennis masters have their own characteristcs: boom bal,fast ball and so on.

The fox master-training with bombs
The monkey master-the ball is fast that you cannot see it

There will be more masters in the future.
